Audit Trails

CareSuite creates audit trails of major user actions based on the log on. You can configure CareSuite to create a more extensive audit trail to help comply with HIPAA requirements for protecting patient data. In addition, users will be warned when opening the charts of “VIP” patients that their actions will be recorded in the audit trail.

The settings affect all CareSuite applications and apply to all departments in the hospital. By default, the audit trail is enabled and confirmation prompts are not shown.

 

 

How to...

l Configure the type of audit trail

l Configure the audit trail warning for users
